=head1 NAME

RDF::Cowl::Lib::Gen::Class::UStrBuf - Generated docs for RDF::Cowl::Ulib::UStrBuf

=head1 MAIN MODULE

L<RDF::Cowl::Ulib::UStrBuf>

=head1 METHODS

=head2 ustrbuf_to_ustring

B<Signature>:

  $self->ustrbuf_to_ustring()

B<Params>:

  UStrBuf $buf 

Documentation:

  Converts the string buffer into a UString and deinitializes the buffer.
  
  @param buf String buffer.
  @return String.
  
  @note After calling this function, the string buffer must not be used anymore.

=over 2

B<C function name>: C<< ustrbuf_to_ustring >>
